name: The Fallen
startIntroPart1: Welcome to the heart of your future undead empire Lich King Urzifel
startIntroPart2: Let us commence the merge between the living and the undead under your glorious banner, there will be no end to the crusade until only we remain, it is a monumentous task but we all trust that you shall unite this world through glorious warfare
declaringWar: All flesh shall become one, you are not an exception
attacked: Your troops shall march against you under our unholy banner
introduction: Let us be united in the afterlife, mortal
hateHello: Are you here for pity, or mercy?
hateLetsHearIt: Spit it out before I rip off your jaw
afterPeace: Peace is temporary, but the afterlife is eternal
tradeRequest: Does this satisfy your greed, mortal?
uniques: 67% chance to earn 25 Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit from a conquered encampment
[+1 Production] per [3] population in all cities
[+2 Food] per [2] population in all cities
